__e: You see, when I found out about you and Erich, I went to your husband and I told him everything because I was unhappy and desperate
Henri must've told him you talked.
So does Eleanor. She knows young Henry's dead.
So Henry has returned here with the aim of killing you.
Listen, I don't want to cause you any more undue stress, but Henry's back in the building, and on a more personal note, they booted me out too.
I'm not an angel, Henry, I'm a woman.
You know, it's getting late, Henri, so I should go.
Listen, I know gettin' out in that world ain't easy leaving Uncle Henry and me.

Now I understand why it all ended, between Henry and me.
